body: No male on male, so no Yaoi tag. The one doing the rape is "female" "@baaskaas123".

I think the writer made a mistake in where this is set (largely the fact TWO characters weren't in the party at this point, one joining AFTER Mia and the other unavailable till post-game for spoiler reasons).


I do see this as a "what if" the "Mia was given Erik BEFORE the party rescued him when he was kidnapped in Act 2"...till I saw the errors which confuse me (but I was able to ignore it and self corrected it myself LOL).
